page.title: 14Festival:LESLEY-ANN
page.content: Lady of the Lake is a festival held in Irvinestown each year.Legend tells us that a beautiful lady went from island to island wearing flowing white gowns and a blue cape and she brought luck and good weather.Every year some young ladies enter a competition to select a Lady of the Lake.Two girls are chosen as her maidens of honour.The Lady of the Lake comes through the town in a boat towed by a car ;her head covered to hide her identity. Her maidens then follow her in a pony and trap and she is revealed on the clock tower.As part of the festival there is dancing and singing in the street.The Fancy Dress Parade is one of the highlights and each evening there is a talent contest in one of the bars with the final held in the Townhall on the last night.The festival attracts locals and visitors to the donkey derby and sports events.
